action_settings - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.id
 
action_settings - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
activity - package activity
 
activity_horizontal_margin - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.dimen
Default screen margins, per the Android Design guidelines.
activity_vertical_margin - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.dimen
 
adapter - package adapter
 
add(Comment) - Method in class model.CommentList
Add a Comment object to the CommentList, if a Comment with a same id already exists, then the old one will be removed before the new one been added.
add(String) - Method in class model.IdSet
Add an Comment id to this IdSet
addAll(Collection<String>) - Method in class model.IdSet
Add a set of Comment ids to this IdSet.
AddCacheReply(Activity, String, Comment) - Method in class cache.CacheController
Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences,(into a CommentList pointed by a key which is the same as the given comment's parent's id) if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by a key equals the given comment's parent's id.
AddFav(Activity, Comment) - Method in class cache.CacheController
Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences as favorite comment,(into a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES") if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES".
addReply(Comment) - Method in class model.Comment
Add the comment id of a reply Comment object to the reply id set.
addReply(String) - Method in class model.Comment
Add the comment id of a reply Comment object to the reply id set.
app_name - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
AppBaseTheme - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.style
Base application theme, dependent on API level.
AppTheme - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.style
Application theme.
attach - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.id
 
attached_pic_dis - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
attachpicture - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
authorInfo - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.id
 
authorinfo - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
authorInfo2 - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.id
